Package org.miniauth.oauth.crypto

MiniAuth OAuth crypto-related classes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    OAuthSignatureAlgorithm  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractOAuthSignatureAlgorithm
    Base class for OAuthSignatureAlgorithm
    HmacSHA1OAuthSignatureAlgorithm
    HMAC-SHA1 signature implementation of OAuthSignatureAlgorithm.
    OAuthSignatureAlgorithmFactory
    Factory for creating OAuthSignatureAlgorithm classes.
    PlainTextOAuthSignatureAlgorithm
    "Plain text" signature implementation of OAuthSignatureAlgorithm.
    RsaSHA1OAuthSignatureAlgorithm
    RSA-SHA1 signature implementation of OAuthSignatureAlgorithm.

Package org.miniauth.oauth.crypto Description

MiniAuth OAuth crypto-related classes. This package includes the three basic signature algorithms required by the OAuth standard v1.
